title: Michael Jordan, Mark Cuban, Ted Leonsis Betting $44 Million on Sportradar’s Data
description: Michael Jordan and Mark Cuban are betting that Sportradar will triumph as a sports “big data” leader, as the Swiss company continues its U.S. expansion.
